testing.title: Increase Unit Test Coverage for Integration Service to 80%
testing.description: The integration-service currently has low test coverage in critical areas like webhook delivery and SIEM adapters. Implement comprehensive unit tests using pytest.
testing.rationale: High test coverage is essential for stability in an enterprise governance system. Webhook delivery and SIEM integrations are particularly prone to regression errors during refactoring.

testing.title: Implement E2E Tests for Analytics Dashboard
testing.description: Create a suite of end-to-end tests using Vitest and Playwright to verify core dashboard functionality: widget dragging, query submission, and data refreshing.
testing.rationale: Visual regressions and broken interaction flows are common in complex React applications using react-grid-layout. E2E tests provide confidence in UI stability.

testing.title: Add Integration Tests for SIEM Adapters
testing.description: Implement integration tests that verify connectivity and data formatting for Splunk, DataDog, and Sentinel adapters using containerized mock services.
testing.rationale: Unit tests often miss connectivity issues or API version mismatches. Integration tests with mock services ensure adapters work correctly against actual (simulated) endpoints.
